example.text: If republicans blow up the economy Social Security checks will stop going out for the first time in America’s history [[url]]

Ambassador Cuadra and I discussed salient issues like trade, national security and migration that bind our countries together. We reaffirmed our commitment to strengthening and preserving the democratic institutions that are so fundamental to the economic, social and political vitality of our respective nations.
Reminder that when we voted *twice* last Congress to keep Roe v. Wade as the law of the land, every single republican in Congress voted no. [[url]]
